README.md:
# Deep Generative Models (RBM, VAE, GAN, etc.) Implementation of Deep Generative Models (e.g. RBM, VAE, GAN, etc.)
RBM : http://image.diku.dk/igel/paper/TRBMAI.pdf
VAE : http://arxiv.org/abs/1312.6114
GAN : http://arxiv.org/abs/1406.2661
##RBM(Restricted Boltzmann Machine) Variants of Visible Units of RBM - Binary Visible Units (for binary data) - Gaussian Visible Units (for real-value data) - Complex-Valued Visuble Units (biologically meaningful units) Approximation Methods for RBM - Contrastive Divergence - (Fast) Persistent Contrastive Divergence - Parallell Tempering Optimization Methods for RBM - Stochastic Gradient Decent - Momentum - AdaGrad - RMSProp - AdaDelta - ADAM - Stochastic Spectral Decent Variants of Boltzmann Machine - DyBM(Dynamic Boltzmann Machine) Variants of Restricted Boltzmann Machine - Conditional RBM - Factored Conditional RBM - Convolutional RBM - Mean and Covariance RBM - Spike and Slab Restricted Boltzmann Machines ##VAE(Variational Auto-Encoder) - Semi-Supervised VAE - Auxiliary Deep Generative Models - Convolutional VAE - Deep Recurrent Attentive Writer - Structured VAE - Importance Weighted Autoencoders ##GAN(Generative Adversarial Networks) - Deep Convolutional Generative Adversarial Network - Laplacian Pyramid of Generative Adversarial Networks
